caption=Mrs. Proudfoot in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''

Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] played by [[Megan Edwards]] who appeared in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' as the equally grumpy wife of [[Everard Proudfoot]] who non-verbally chastises him for being amused by [[Gandalf]]'s firework antics.
